resources.string:
" "1、Fingers under sliding around,can get the same effect as the left and right buttons
" "2、The TV key can make the playing TV to full screen in any interface
" "3、Channel key can quickly switch the program on the STB 
" "4、The off button can make the STB is in a low power mode, and does not affect the digital TV program to share mobile devices

" "1、Please hold down the screen anywhere, start to speak, after the release, the assistant automatically for you to identify the instructions. Currently supports voice commands, can help you change the channel and start box program, please look forward to more instructions… 
" "2、The instructions of change channels:such as says "CCTV-1",the STB will be changed to CCTV-1
" "3、Boot program instructions: such as to say "turn on the TV assistant", the STB will automatically start the mobile assistant program
" "4、When the speech recognition does not respond, please make sure the mobile phone network is open,and connect to the Internet

" "1、Reservation TV will notice by two ways,when your phone is in the lock screen, the system will inform you by message. When your phone is in use, the system will inform you through a dialog,click the name of a program in the dialog, you can directly watch living programs.\n" "2、In order to ensure you can receive a message, please enter the system settings - > Application Management - > select TV assistant - > uncheck show notification
" "1、We can project the PDF and PPT file by click.\n" "2、We can control the PDF file by remote control,and exit by return key。
Please use wired network to connect the STB,otherwise it is difficult to ensure play digital TV play smooth.
The current connection is in the range of 2.4G, HD program will may be cards
"The update file is loading,please wait patiently."
Attention:you are now connected to the mobile network,operator will change fees\n\n
Update the version of STB suit
